--- select_singer_with_tablesample.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS A TABLESAMPLE RESERVOIR (100 ROWS),
  Singers AS B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (0.1 PERCENT),
  Singers AS C TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (0.1 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      18,
            end:      30,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   26,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  29,
                end:  30,
                Name: "A",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: &parser.TableSample{
            pos:    31,
            Method: "RESERVOIR",
            Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
              pos:   53,
              end:   63,
              Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
                pos:   54,
                end:   57,
                Base:  10,
                Value: "100",
              },
              Unit: "ROWS",
            },
          },
        },
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      67,
            end:      79,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  67,
              end:  74,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   75,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  78,
                end:  79,
                Name: "B",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: &parser.TableSample{
            pos:    80,
            Method: "BERNOULLI",
            Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
              pos:   102,
              end:   115,
              Value: &parser.FloatLiteral{
                pos:   103,
                end:   106,
                Value: "0.1",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      119,
            end:      131,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  119,
              end:  126,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   127,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  130,
                end:  131,
                Name: "C",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: &parser.TableSample{
            pos:    132,
            Method: "BERNOULLI",
            Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
              pos:   154,
              end:   167,
              Value: &parser.FloatLiteral{
                pos:   155,
                end:   158,
                Value: "0.1",
              },
              Unit: "PERCENT",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A TABLESAMPLE RESERVOIR(100 ROWS), Singers AS B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(0.1 PERCENT), Singers AS C TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI(0.1 PERCENT)
